name: trefoil
content:
trefoil noun
(PLANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] one of many different small, wild plants related to clover that have leaves divided into three parts and small yellow, red, white, or purple flowers : The yellow flowers of bird's foot trefoil hummed with bees. Clovers and trefoils are highly dependent on pollinators.
More examplesFewer examplesThe recipe calls for fresh trefoil and shiso leaf.Wild plants such as bird's-foot trefoil and creeping buttercup threaten to take over.

trefoil noun
(DESIGN)
[ C or U ] a shape that consists of three curved lines arranged in a circle: The trefoil shape is found throughout the cathedral's architectural design. The building has three sides, three floors, trefoil windows, and three gables on each side.
